recommendations: Vaibhav Dusad “Jagath is one of the most easy to collaborate guy I have ever worked with. A quick learner, who understands problems quickly and with his creative mindset brings in innovate solutions. No need to nudge him every now and then for any task, as he comes in with a great sense of responsibility and will get things done before one could expect. ”
